name: Fraserview Banquet Hall
address: Fraserview Banquet Hall, 8240 Fraser St, Vancouver, BC V5X 3X6

featured_reviews.review_id:
I'd like to give a huge thank you to Fraserview Hall for going above and beyond to host my Haldi and Reception events. Working with Fraserview was extremely easy and the staff prioritize their customers and truly want you to have the best experience.

The hall itself is a stunning venue with chandeliers throughout the hall, a massive elevated dancefloor, modern carpeting, high quality speaker system and a gorgeous outdoor balcony that my guests enjoyed majority of their evening taking pictures outside on a sunny day.

I can't thank the Manager Antony enough for his exceptional customer service. He is solely the reason why I booked both of my events at Fraserview Hall. I had other deposits at another competing hall but Antony ensured me that I was in good hands and now that my events are over I can 1000% say that Fraserview Hall exceeded my expectations. My family and friends are now booking Fraserview Hall for their events after attending mine. It was the most glamorous Haldi and Wedding Reception I've ever experienced and booking Fraserview Hall was the best decision!

The in house DJ was wonderful and played beautiful songs that my guests and myself could dance all night to. I highly recommend booking the in house DJ, they are very organized and prepare all your songs to make sure everything runs smoothly.

The food was absolutely delicious, my guests had second helpings and several people told me their favourite items were the vegetable chow mein, fish pakora, chicken tikka, goat curry and bbq tandoori chicken.

I also really enjoyed working with the Decor team. They truly worked their magic and made every detail look absolutely perfect. My Haldi night looked like a Bollywood movie set with all the beautiful bright colours, umbrella arch, glittery table runners, gold elephants and fancy decor pieces.

They also created the most stunning set up for my Reception which included a hanging floral and crystal walkway, floating candles, chandeliers, white roses with an elegant backdrop for the stage. They upgraded and sourced gorgeous decor and took care of everything. I am grateful for the hard working staff, especially Harmeet and Shrungerri who executed my visions and made them better! My advice to anyone booking Fraserview Hall is to trust the staff, they know what they are doing and you will not be disappointed.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind review of Fraserview banquet hall. We are thrilled to hear that you had a satisfying experience during your recent visit. Our team takes pride in providing exceptional service and ensuring that our guests have a memorable time. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

featured_reviews.review_id: The decor was so beautiful and the team was very accommodative and communicative! I am really happy doing my Maiyan and jago here especially for the nice decor services they offer with the package
featured_reviews.review_text: The decor was so beautiful and the team was very accommodative and communicative! I am really happy doing my Maiyan and jago here especially for the nice decor services they offer with the package
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Gurinder, Thank you for taking time out to share your kind review. We appreciate your feedback and are glad that you had a good experience with our services. We look forward to hosting you again. Take care. Team Fraserview.

featured_reviews.review_id:
We attended a wedding reception at Fraserview banquet hall on Saturday, September 16, 2023.

Overall, it was a great event, and the food was excellent. However, in particular, I would like to thank the gentleman standing outside the front door, who was responsible for security in the evening. We could not find parking so parked in the lot across the street and when he saw us approaching, he let us know that we should move our vehicle, as it would get towed.  During our conversation, we mentioned that we had a handicap parking decal, and he immediately offered us the parking spot that was reserved with pylons right next to the entrance of the hall. This is a level of courtesy that we usually do not see at these types of events. I appreciate Fraserview hiring staff members that care for their guests.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: It warms our hearts to read your glowing review! We strive to provide the best possible experience, and we're ecstatic that we met your expectations.

featured_reviews.review_id: Sunil  and his team are so responsive and are always available to answer any questions. Organizing my daughter party  with them has been a pleasure and I would highly recommend hosting an event here. The space is beautiful and the food is so good!
featured_reviews.review_text: Sunil  and his team are so responsive and are always available to answer any questions. Organizing my daughter party  with them has been a pleasure and I would highly recommend hosting an event here. The space is beautiful and the food is so good!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Niranjan,
Thank you for your kind words and positive review of Fraserview Hall. We are delighted to hear that you had a fantastic experience with us. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we are thrilled that we were able to meet your expectations. We appreciate your support and look forward to serving you again soon.

featured_reviews.review_id: We had our family reunion at Frasier Banquet Hall, and it was the perfect venue. The spacious hall allowed us to comfortably accommodate all our relatives, and the catering service was delicious
featured_reviews.review_text: We had our family reunion at Frasier Banquet Hall, and it was the perfect venue. The spacious hall allowed us to comfortably accommodate all our relatives, and the catering service was delicious
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We're over the moon knowing that you had a fantastic time at our venue. Our team works hard to make every event extraordinary, and your feedback motivates us even more.

featured_reviews.review_id: Last weekend I had an amazing experience at my sister's reception and all the credit goes to Anthony. He is such a nice, humble and down to earth person. Never seen a manger like him. I would definitely say don't hesitate to book a party here.
featured_reviews.review_text: Last weekend I had an amazing experience at my sister's reception and all the credit goes to Anthony. He is such a nice, humble and down to earth person. Never seen a manger like him. I would definitely say don't hesitate to book a party here.

Our team takes pride in providing exceptional service and ensuring that our guests have a memorable time. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

featured_reviews.review_id: Many stairs to go up to the hall, Food is tasty.  Hard to make conversation because the music is super loud. Full unfinished Drinks are taken away from the table by the servers and its annoying, they don't ask, you come back from the washroom or buffet table, your drinks will be gone.  My drinks were taken away 4 times.
featured_reviews.review_text: Many stairs to go up to the hall, Food is tasty.  Hard to make conversation because the music is super loud. Full unfinished Drinks are taken away from the table by the servers and its annoying, they don't ask, you come back from the washroom or buffet table, your drinks will be gone.  My drinks were taken away 4 times.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ann, appreciate you taking out your precious time to write to us, we are glad you loved our food. With regards to the inconvenience caused due to the stair entry, incase you missed out I would like to highlight that we do have an elevator entrance for the hall also Music volume is maintained as per the requirement of the host, but we will for sure note this valuable feedback. Thank you for the review and we are looking forward to seeing you again in future. :)

featured_reviews.review_id: Been going there since 15+ years and the food has been consistently amazing since day 1. Amazing food, amazing service and such a convenient location. I would give them 10 stars if that's an option.
featured_reviews.review_text: Been going there since 15+ years and the food has been consistently amazing since day 1. Amazing food, amazing service and such a convenient location. I would give them 10 stars if that's an option.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Preeti, Thank you for your unwavering loyalty and for being a valued customer for over 15+ years. We're thrilled to hear that you continue to have positive experiences at our banquet hall. Your support means the world to us, and we look forward to many more years of serving you with excellence.
